meanings.definition: Covered with small bristles or bristle-like structures.
meanings.sent1: The cat's tongue felt setulous as it licked my hand.
meanings.sent2: The plant's stem was setulous to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The setulous surface of the cactus made it challenging to touch without getting pricked.
meanings.sent4: The setulous texture of the fabric reminded me of tiny needles.
meanings.sent5: The setulous sensation of the brush against my skin was uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Having a rough or prickly surface.
meanings.sent1: The old tree bark was setulous and scratched my hand.
meanings.sent2: The setulous sandpaper was perfect for smoothing rough edges.
meanings.sent3: The setulous rug made walking barefoot a painful experience.
meanings.sent4: The setulous rock surface resembled a bed of needles.
meanings.sent5: The setulous texture of the wall made it difficult to lean against.
